channel.title: PI Help!
channel.description:
Well, when i try to run a PI client and it won't let me run a (32bit) Client or a (64bit) Client for any PI server! When I try to run a 32 bit this message pops up: [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2psow1f.jpg[/img]
Now when I try to run a (64bit) Client the .bat file pops up but then dissapears around 5 seconds later. Please help?
Thanks!
